ygData.subject: Re: Very upset....Need help w/ Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I usually say stuff like would you like me help you to protect the peace? or why do I have to protect the peace those are basic things that I say to
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I usually say stuff like "would you like me help you to protect the peace?" or "why do I have to protect the peace" those are
basic things that I say to every NPC with out the protect the peace stuff.. that is just a tip.. and here is another.. think the
basics.. Who? what? when? where? why? how? they will always help ya out..

Trilin
Everworld

darksharp@... wrote:

> From: darksharp@...
>
> I (and many of my EQ friends) are finding ourselves very frustrated with query responses to NPCs.
>
> It is almost impossible to get an NPC to respond becuase the correct words in regards to their prompts are extremely non-intutive.
>
> For example playing a LVL7 Wizard out of Erudin.
>
> A quest with the Paladins for a poachers.
>
> I say Hail to the Janlin Sklar (or something like that)
>
> He says a bunch of mumbo jumbo with the words (protect the peace) in brackets.
>
> So naturally I say:
>
> Protect the Peace?
> How can I protect the peace?
> etc.
>
> Every variation I can think...
>
> Nothing...all I get is I have not proven myself to the Temple yet...eh?
>
> HELP!!!
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for an efficient, fun way to stay in touch with family members?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Create a ONElist community just for your family!
